mapper.insert: insert into classroom_location (id, teachBuildNo, classroomNo, capacity, classroomAttr) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teachbuildno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroomno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classroomattr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, teachBuildNo, classroomNo, capacity, classroomAttr from classroom_location where teachBuildNo = #{teachBuildNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
